name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior C# Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing secure, high-performance software solutions with a deep focus on cybersecurity and regulatory compliance. Adept in **C#**, **.NET**, and **Python**, and skilled in secure coding practices, vulnerability management, authentication, and authorization strategies. Expertise in industrial network security, IT/OT integration, and familiar with frameworks and guidelines such as **NIST** and **OWASP**. Proven track record in building applications that adhere to regulatory standards while leveraging technologies for automated testing and threat modeling using methodologies like **STRIDE**.

Additionally, experienced in full-stack development with a strong technical toolkit that includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proficient in deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS** while leveraging microservices architecture and CI/CD automation. Committed to designing systems that not only excel in functionality but also prioritize security and compliance, enabling organizations to navigate the complexities of the healthcare and finance sectors effectively.

experience.responsibilities:
• Leveraged **C#** and **.NET** frameworks to design and implement secure, scalable applications, ensuring adherence to regulatory compliance standards such as NIST and OWASP.
• Developed robust authentication and authorization mechanisms using **encryption** strategies, enhancing **cyber security** posture against vulnerabilities and threats.
• Executed vulnerability management processes in alignment with **cyber security** best practices, utilizing tools for threat modeling following **STRIDE** methodology.
• Enhanced industrial network security by integrating **TCP/IP** protocols and ensuring secure communications for **IT/OT integration** environments.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement automated testing strategies, ensuring high code quality and reliability in applications deployed in production environments.
• Designed and built secure APIs using **Python** for backend services, while incorporating secure coding practices to protect against vulnerabilities.
• Authored comprehensive documentation for secure coding practices and vulnerability management processes, promoting awareness of **cyber security** within the development team.
• Executed tests using automated testing frameworks, achieving over **90% test coverage** in both unit and integration testing, thereby improving overall software quality.
• Participated in security audits and assessments, successfully remediating issues to maintain compliance with **regulatory frameworks** such as **HIPAA**, **GDPR**, and **PCI DSS**.
• Engaged in continuous improvement by staying updated on the latest trends in **cyber security** and incorporating new strategies into current projects.

• Developed robust financial platform solutions with a strong emphasis on **C#**, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and secure coding practices.
• Enhanced system security while modernizing infrastructures through established vulnerability management strategies, cyber security protocols, and adherence to **NIST** guidelines.
• Implemented authentication and authorization mechanisms within financial applications to ensure secure access management, employing **OWASP** principles.
• Transformed legacy systems utilizing **C#** and **Python**, significantly improving maintainability and scalability for high-volume transaction environments.
• Led initiatives to enhance industrial network security (OT cybersecurity) by integrating **TCP/IP** and **USB** protocols, fortifying the security posture of operational technology.
• Automated testing processes using established frameworks to ensure system integrity, reliability, and compliance across various modules.
• Conducted threat modeling using the **STRIDE** methodology to identify potential vulnerabilities in financial software architectures, implementing appropriate mitigations.
• Collaborated on cross-functional teams to integrate **IT/OT integration**, enhancing performance metrics across systems while maintaining security standards.
• Engaged in continuous learning and adaptation of best practices in **cyber security**, ensuring teams remained updated on emerging threats and mitigation strategies.

Enhanced industrial network security and OT cybersecurity initiatives by integrating secure coding practices in **.NET** and **C#** applications, aligning with **NIST** standards for regulatory compliance.
Developed and maintained authentication and authorization protocols utilizing **OWASP** guidelines to ensure user data protection and secure access control, with a focus on **role-based access control (RBAC)**.
Implemented robust vulnerability management strategies encompassing encryption mechanisms and threat modeling using **STRIDE** to fortify the application against attacks.
Designed efficient data communication and protocols, leveraging **TCP/IP** for secure transfer in industrial environments while utilizing **USB** standards for device connectivity.
Engineered automated testing frameworks using **Python**, ensuring high-quality code with reduced vulnerabilities across **9+** applications.
Conducted security audits and tests to evaluate compliance with cybersecurity regulations, thereby maintaining adherence to **IT/OT integration** protocols.
Led training sessions for development teams on secure coding practices, enhancing the overall security competence by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify potential threats and implementing solutions that resulted in a **50%** reduction in application vulnerabilities over two release cycles.
